channel.title: Can some1 do something about this mod! keeps locken my posts cuz shes mad at me!
channel.description: ok this mod named melissa t is locking my advertising posts cuz she thinks my layouts rong an shes really just mad at me my layout is right cuz ive used it since they came out with this new rule an no1s said it was rong and its not

item.title: Can some1 do something about this mod! keeps locken my posts cuz shes mad at me!
item.dc:creator: @sukapyks123 sukapyks123
item.description:
@sukapyks123 wrote:

[quote=“jehanne, post:3, topic:60518”]she wont lock your topics for wrong layout if your layout is right. im sure.

read the topic about layout again, rules can change.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

EDIT: just saw one of your ads, and indeed, layout IS wrong.[/quote]itś not WRONG!! [br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2007, 08:24:04 AM[/size][hr][quote=“alex2916s, post:1, topic:60518”]ok this mod named melissa t is locking my advertising posts cuz she thinks my layouts rong an shes really just mad at me my layout is right cuz ive used it since they came out with this new rule an no1s said it was rong and its not[/quote]dont worry i wrote to her…like is she/he a retard and so on i hope it settles it topic closed?=)
